description: Savant created the ultimate soldier to kill every last Imperial so she could reclaim Earth but the plan went awry. As an immortal with no fear of ailment and incredible physical attributes war and anarchy is a wonderful opportunity. However, not having received a proper education means learning and reading will be very difficult. 200 years of retirement has made you weak, you'll need to harvest some souls to regain your power.

Soldiers become useless after permanent injuries, death, and old age, you were designed to solve this.  Your body is tied to essence on a cosmic level, you will regenerate any wound, never involuntarily age past your late teens, you have limited shapeshifting ability via changing hair and eye color, you can perform beyond biological limits thanks to essence, and other organisms will not survive inside of you.

Savant found it far easier to instill psionic and magical power the younger the person was, you were still inside her when your powers surfaced.  Though most mages train their whole lives and experiment with meditation, drugs, and studying religious texts, you had a headstart.  Your powers layed dormant until the war happened.

There was no centralized education system in the 2120's and 2130's.  You didn't learn to read until after the first wasteland war when you were 14, and besides a basic education you are mostly self-taught by old textbooks from the Warrens bookstores.  You'll have a very difficult time learning and reading but you do enjoy it significantly.

Your liver is damaged from extreme alcoholism and drug abuse, your lungs are scarred from poisonous gases and smoking, your body is covered in scars and you have minor bone injuries. Though your body can regenerate anything, even lost limbs, the constant physical abuse has taken its toll and your magic is consumed elsewhere, you'll need to restart your healing through a combination of magic and medicine.

This is here in case I need the old stats for some reason, I went with a heavily nerfed version to make it not an instant win along with a progression method. It should only be found in the debug menu.

You have no idea what you are, who you are, or how you got here, all you know is you are hungry and must eat. You look like an undead horror, zombies ignore you, people fear you. You think, therefore you are, therefore you're hungry for flesh.
The result of decades of human experimentation, you are the next step in human evolution through essence.
Your body is improved beyond human biology via relying on Essence. Increased strength, dexterity and speed are all expected.
Your body is improved beyond human biology via relying on Essence. Immunity to electrical attacks, plus resistance to other forms of damage and quicker regeneration of tissue is expected.
Your body is improved beyond human biology via relying on Essence. Increased Intelligence, Perception and learning is expected.
Your body is improved beyond human biology via relying on Essence. Psionic abilities that heavily improve your ability to communicate with others is expected.
Your body is improved beyond human biology via relying on Essence. Increased mana regeneration and storage is expected.

The director of the Shi, undisputed leader of all clans, and sole member by blood of Clan Kawakami. They all know your face, even arbiters will react with fear while many low ranked Imperials will flee in abject terror.

An elite master of all clan disciplines, chosen for the most delicate or dangerous assignments. There's only five of you, they all know your face. Even arbiters will react with fear while many low ranked Imperials will flee in abject terror.
A born and raised soldier of the warrior clan Arakawa. Though your name is unknown, your clan is feared among Imperials for brutality and lack of mercy.
A born and raised technician of the engineer clan Seburo. Though your name is unknown, your clan is respected for their diligence and devotion to R&D.
A born and raised agent of the intelligence clan Ishikawa. Though your name is unknown, your clan is respected for their skill at conflict resolution and subterfuge.
